member.name: T:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImplementor
member.summary: This class is instantiated dynamically (by reflection)

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects this instance from the remote end point.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.Disconnect(System.String)
member.summary: Disconnects this instance with specified bye message for the remote end point.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.SendMessage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the message as .RealiableOrdered on channel 0.
member.returns: True if the message was succesfully sent.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.SendMessage(System.Byte[],Fusee.Engine.MessageDelivery,System.Int32)
member.returns: True if the message was succesfully sent.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the remote end point aka the connection partner.

member.name: P:Fusee.Engine.NetworkConnection.RoundtripTime
member.summary: Gets the roundtrip time of a packet. This is the time in milliseconds that a packet requires to be send to the remote end point and back.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.GetLocalIp
member.summary: Gets the local ip. Do not use this often due to performance reasons.
member.returns: The local ip as a string.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.OpenConnection(Fusee.Engine.SysType,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.returns: True if connection was succesfully opened.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.OpenConnection(Fusee.Engine.SysType,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Establish connection to port and host.
member.param: The type of the system (only peer or client are supported).
member.returns: True if connection was succesfully opened.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.SendMessage(System.Byte[],Fusee.Engine.MessageDelivery,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a message through a channel with defined message delivery type.
member.returns: True if the message was sent succesfully.

member.name: M:Fusee.Engine.NetworkImp.SendMessage(System.Byte[],Lidgren.Network.NetConnection,Fusee.Engine.MessageDelivery,System.Int32)
member.returns: True if the message was sent succesfully.

member.summary: Sends the discovery message on defined port.

member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration of the network.

member.summary: Gets all the connections that this instance is handling.

member.summary: Gets all the incoming Messages that are not yet viewed.
